contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Laarne |picture= |picture-width=260px |picture-legend= |map=LaarneLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Laarne in [[East Flanders]] |arms=Laarne wapen.gif |flag=Flag of Laarne.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Dendermonde|Dendermonde]] |nis=42010 |pyramid-date=01/01/2006 |0-19=21.65 |20-64=61.17 |65=17.18 |foreigners=1.89 |foreigners-date=01/07/2005 |mayor=Ignace De Baerdemaecker ([[VLD]]) |majority=[[VLD]], [[SP.A]], VU&ID |postal-codes=9270 |telephone-area=09 |web=[http://www.laarne.be/ www.laarne.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=01 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=51 }} '''Laarne''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Kalken]] and Laarne proper. On January 1, 2006 Laarne had a total population of 11,736. The total area is 32.07 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 366 inhabitants per km². The current mayor of Laarne is Ignace De Baerdemaecker, from the VLD (Liberal) party. ==History== The village lies to the east of [[Ghent]], near a former course of the River [[Scheldt]] and is notable for its castle. This dates from the twelfth and later centuries, notably, the seventeenth and has been sympathetically restored and re-furnished. The name arises from the Germanic ''hlaeri'' which signifies terrain seen as [[Swamp|wooded and marshy]]. It is possible to speculate that the village originated in serving the castle, which in turn, guarded the river approach to Ghent from the sea. In the twelfth century, that was less remote from the city than it is today. In 1040, Laarne was mentioned as ''Laren''. The lordship passed by inheritance through the families of Schoutheete, van Vilsteren and others, finally to the counts of Ribaucourt. The castle is now owned by the ''Vereniging van Historische Woonsteden van België'' (the Union of Historic Homesteads of Belgium). ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.laarne.be Official website ] - Only available in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]]
